header.description: The Micro Focus LoadRunner Plugin is a quality automation based plugin. It is run during development and deployment to automate the execution of performance tests.

step-type.name: Execute LoadRunner Scenario
step-type.description: Execute a LoadRunner Scenario from the file system

property-ui.label: LoadRunner Installation Directory
property-ui.description: The path to your LoadRunner installation directory. This is the parent of the bin directory, which contains both the WLRun and AnalysisUI executable files. Either specify an absolute path (i.e. C:\Program Files (x86)\Micro Focus\LoadRunner) or a path that is relative to your working directory (i.e. LoadRunner).

property-ui.label: Test Scenario Path
property-ui.description: The path to your test scenario file (.LRS file). Either specify an absolute path (i.e. C:\Users\Administrator\Controller\scenario\Test Scenario.lrs) or a path that is relative to your working directory (i.e. Test Scenario.lrs).

property-ui.label: LoadRunner Results Name
property-ui.description: The name of the new directory that will contain the results of your test scenario. This directory will be created under the step's working directory.

property-ui.label: Debug Output
property-ui.description: Select this option to display debug output during execution.

step-type.name: Analyze LoadRunner Scenario
step-type.description: Analyze a LoadRunner Scenario and produce a HTML Report

property-ui.label: LoadRunner Installation Directory
property-ui.description: The path to your LoadRunner installation directory. This is the parent of the bin directory, which contains both the WLRun and AnalysisUI executable files. Either specify an absolute path (i.e. C:\Program Files (x86)\Micro Focus\LoadRunner) or a path that is relative to your working directory (i.e. LoadRunner).

property-ui.label: LoadRunner Results Name
property-ui.description: The name of the directory that contains the results of a test scenario. The default DA_ANALYSIS_TEMPLATE will create the HTML report 'An_Report1.html'.

property-ui.label: Template Name
property-ui.description: The name of your LoadRunner Analysis template. The default value of 'DA_ANALYSIS_TEMPLATE' will import a custom template into the LoadRunner Analysis tool. This template is included with the plugin and generates a detailed HTML report in the agent's working directory when used during analysis. You may also create your own template in the LoadRunner Analysis UI and specify its name to use it during analysis. Please see the plugin documentation for more details.

property-ui.label: Debug Output
property-ui.description: Select this option to display debug output during execution.
